comment: Aur jo bail pe he...uska kya...aur Ravish tu toh vese bhi bhadua he... Jaha pese mile uska he tu... Nautanki
amr:
# ::snt Aur jo bail pe he...uska kya...aur Ravish tu toh vese bhi bhadua he... Jaha pese mile uska he tu... Nautanki
(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (p / person
            :name (n / name
                  :op1 "Aur"
                  :op2 "j"
                  :op3 "bail"
                  :op4 "pe"
                  :op5 "He")
            :mod (k / kya))
      :snt2 (p2 / person
            :name (n2 / name
                  :op1 "Ravish")
            :mod (t / toh
                  :mod (v / vese)
                  :mod-of p2)
            :mod (b / bhi-bhadua))
      :snt3 (p3 / person
            :name (n3 / name
                  :op1 "Jaha"
                  :op2 "pese"
                  :op3 "mile"
                  :op4 "meanska he tu"))
      :snt4 (p4 / person
            :name (n4 / name
                  :op1 "Nautanki")))
